CONSOLIDATED BILLING SERVICES
On behalf of: Premium Healthcare Partners

Statement of Account
Page 1 of 2

Account Number: PH-29481
Statement Period: Q4 2024
Prepared: January 5, 2025

Patient Services Summary:
  Office Visits (4)              $600.00
  Lab Work                       $450.00
  Specialist Referral            $200.00

[Continued on Page 2]

--- PAGE BREAK ---

Page 2 of 2

Brought Forward:                 $1,250.00

Additional Charges:
  Medical Records Fee            $25.00
  After-hours Consultation       $150.00

Insurance Adjustment:            -$400.00
Patient Responsibility:          $1,025.00

PLEASE PAY BY: February 5, 2025

Make checks payable to:
Consolidated Billing Services
Remit to: PO Box 9900
